comments.body: I think this probably should be passed in as a constructor parameter as a non-`Future` value. This has the smell of potential flakiness.
I see your point, I'll investigate it further.

Addressed by https://github.com/digital-asset/daml/pull/2282/commits/e41532036369394d18a9a5278323f476d24fce77

Thanks for the tip given offline.
